Title: Amityville: A New Generation
Actors: Ross Partridge, Julia Nickson, Lala Sloatman, David Naughton
Plot: Photographer Keyes is given an old mirror from an homeless person he photographs on the street, takes it home and gives it a friend. He doesn't know yet that people see horrible things happen to themselves in the mirror and later these things come true. Are these really suicides or is there a demonic force behind the mirror?
